æ— è®ºæ˜¯å¯¹å…¶é¢˜æè¿˜æ˜¯å‡ºå‘ç‚¹æˆ–æ˜¯æœ€åå‘ˆç°çš„ç»“æœï¼Œæœ¬ä¹¦çš„äº‰è®®éƒ½éå¸¸å¤§ã€‚å¾ˆéš¾å‡†ç¡®å®šä¹‰å®ƒçš„å±æ€§ï¼Œæˆ‘æŠŠå®ƒå½“æˆä¸€æœ¬èåˆäº†ä¸€äº›ç°å®å’Œä½œè€…è‡ªæˆ‘æƒ³è±¡çš„æ•…äº‹é›†ï¼Œæ€€ç€äº†è§£åˆ«äººçš„å¥½å¥‡å¿ƒå»çœ‹å…¶å®è¿˜æ˜¯ä¸é”™çš„ã€‚å…¨ä¹¦æ˜¯ç²¾ç¥ç—…äººçš„è„‘æ´åˆé›†ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­æœ‰äº›æƒ³æ³•å¹¶ä¸æ–°é²œï¼Œæœ‰äº›æƒ³æ³•ä¹Ÿå¾ˆæœ‰æ„æ€ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªäººåœ¨å¹´è½»çš„æ—¶å€™éƒ½ä¼šæœ‰å„ç§å…³äºä¸–ç•Œçš„å¥‡æ€å¦™æƒ³ï¼Œè¿™ç§èƒ½åŠ›æ˜¯éšç€å¹´é¾„é€’å‡çš„ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ¯•ç«Ÿç°å®è¿˜æ˜¯éœ€è¦æˆå¹´äººå»é¢å¯¹å’Œæ‰¿æ‹…çš„ï¼Œè¿™äº›æƒ³æ³•ä¹Ÿå˜å¾—ä¸å†æœ‰å¸å¼•åŠ›äº†ã€‚åªæŠŠå®ƒä»¬å½“åšä¸€ç§å¾ˆæœ‰è¶£çš„è§’åº¦çš„è¯å®Œå…¨æ²¡é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¦æ˜¯å¤ªè¿‡æ‰§ç€çš„è¯è¿˜æ˜¯å¤šè¯»ä¹¦å§ã€‚è¿™ç§æ„Ÿè§‰å’Œè¯»ã€ŠèŠæ–‹å¿—å¼‚ã€‹æœ‰ç‚¹ç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œé€‚åˆä½œä¸ºèŒ¶ä½™é¥­åçš„è°ˆèµ„ã€‚

  • ã€Šå±€å¤–äººã€‹

å±€å¤–äººå› ä¸ºæ²¡æœ‰åœ¨æ¯äº²è‘¬ç¤¼ä¸Šå“­è¢«åˆ¤å¤„æ­»åˆ‘ã€‚ä»–æœ€ç»ˆæ„è¯†åˆ°äº†è¿™ä¸ªä¸–ç•Œé™¤äº†ä»–è¿™ç§å¼‚ç±»æ˜¯å¤šä¹ˆçš„å’Œè°ï¼Œè€Œä»–ä¹Ÿåº”è¯¥ä½œä¸ºå’Œè°ä¸–ç•Œçš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†è€Œæˆä¸ºå’Œè°ä¸–ç•Œæ›´åŠ å’Œè°çš„å› ç´ ï¼Œåªä¸ºäº†å–„å§‹å–„ç»ˆï¼ŒåŠŸå¾·åœ†æ»¡ã€‚

åŠ ç¼ªè¯„ä»·ä»–çš„å±€å¤–äººï¼šâ€œä»–ä¸è€èŠ±æ‹›ï¼Œæ‹’ç»è¯´è°ï¼Œæ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆä»–å°±è¯´ä»€ä¹ˆã€‚ä»–æ‹’ç»è¡¨æ¼”è‡ªå·±ã€çŸ«é¥°æ„Ÿæƒ…ï¼Œå–„è‰¯å®½å’Œï¼Œä¸è¯´åºŸè¯ã€‚ä»–çš„éšå’Œæ¸©é¡ºã€å¥½è¯´è¯ã€ä¸è®¡è¾ƒã€å®‰åˆ†ã€å®åœ¨ï¼Œåœ¨ç¤¾ä¼šçœ‹æ¥å°±æ˜¯å†·æ·¡ã€å­¤åƒ»ã€ä¸é€šäººæƒ…ã€ä¸æ‡‚è§„çŸ©ã€ä½œé£æ•£æ¼«ã€åº¸åº¸ç¢Œç¢Œã€æµ‘æµ‘å™©å™©â€¦â€¦ ä»–æ˜¯ç©·äººï¼Œæ˜¯å¦è¯šçš„äººï¼Œå–œçˆ±å…‰æ˜æ­£å¤§ã€‚ä»–æ˜¯æ— ä»»ä½•è‹±é›„è¡Œä¸ºè€Œè‡ªæ„¿ä¸ºçœŸç†è€Œæ­»çš„äººâ€¦â€¦.â€

è¿™ç§å±€å¤–äººå¤ªç†æƒ³åŒ–äº†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¯´åœ¨å½“ä»Šä¸–ç•Œæ ¹éƒ¨ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæˆ–è€…è¯´åªå­˜åœ¨äºæ¯ä¸ªäººæˆé•¿è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­çš„ä¸€ç¬é—´ï¼Œç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬éƒ½æˆä¸ºäº†å’Œè°ä¸–ç•Œçš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚

24.èŠ‚ç‚¹é—´é€šè·¯

æ€è·¯ï¼šæœ‰å‘å›¾å¯ä»¥ç”¨é‚»æ¥è¡¨è¡¨ç¤ºæ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ç›´æ¥è¿æ¥çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæœ‰äº†é‚»æ¥è¡¨å°±å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ·±åº¦æˆ–å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸Šå›¾èŠ‚ç‚¹1ä¸ºstartä¸ºä¾‹ï¼Œæ‰¾1èƒ½åˆ°è¾¾çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼š

å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ï¼šéœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—æ¥å­˜å¯ä»¥åˆ°è¾¾çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œä»1å¼€å§‹ï¼Œåˆ°2ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶éœ€è¦å°†2çš„é‚»æ¥èŠ‚ç‚¹5åŠ å…¥åˆ°é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ°4ï¼Œå†å°†4çš„é‚»æ¥èŠ‚ç‚¹2åŠ å…¥åˆ°é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯2é‡å¤äº†å°±ä¸éœ€è¦åŠ äº†ï¼Œå› æ­¤è¿˜éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªå¸ƒå°”æ•°ç»„åˆ¤é‡ï¼Œåˆ°5ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å°†5çš„é‚»æ¥4åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯é‡å¤äº†å°±ä¸éœ€è¦åŠ äº†ï¼Œ5å®Œäº†é˜Ÿåˆ—å°±ç©ºäº†ï¼Œå› æ­¤1èƒ½åˆ°è¾¾çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½éå†äº†ã€‚é¡ºåºæ˜¯1-2-4-5

æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ï¼š1åˆ°2ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å°†1çš„å…¶ä»–é‚»æ¥å­˜åˆ°æ ˆä¸­ï¼Œæ‰¾2çš„é‚»æ¥5ï¼Œç„¶åå°†2çš„å…¶ä»–é‚»æ¥å­˜åˆ°æ ˆä¸­æ‰¾5çš„é‚»æ¥4ï¼Œå°†5çš„å…¶ä»–é‚»æ¥å­˜åˆ°æ ˆä¸­ï¼Œæ‰¾4çš„é‚»æ¥2ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å¸ƒå°”æ•°ç»„åˆ¤2é‡äº†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åˆ°å¤´äº†ï¼Œæ‰¾4çš„å…¶ä»–é‚»æ¥ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰ï¼Œå†å–æ ˆä¸­å…ƒç´ æ˜¯5çš„å…¶ä»–é‚»æ¥ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰ï¼Œå†å–æ ˆä¸­2çš„å…¶ä»–é‚»æ¥æ²¡æœ‰ï¼Œå†å–æ ˆä¸­1çš„å…¶ä»–é‚»æ¥æ˜¯4å‘ç°é‡å¤äº†ï¼Œ1ä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰å…¶ä»–é‚»æ¥äº†ï¼Œæ ˆç©ºéå†ç»“æŸã€‚é¡ºåºæ˜¯1-2-5-4ã€‚

class Solution {    public boolean findWhetherExistsPath(int n, int[][] graph, int start, int target) {        List<Integer>[] graphList = graphList(n,graph);        boolean[] marked = new boolean[n];        return dfs(graphList,start,target,marked);    }    //å°†å›¾å­˜ä¸ºé‚»æ¥è¡¨    private List<Integer>[] graphList(int n,int[][] graph){        List<Integer>[] graphList = new ArrayList[n];        for (int[] i:graph){            //å»ºç¬¬i[0]ä½ç½®çš„é“¾è¡¨            if (graphList[i[0]]==null){                graphList[i[0]]=new ArrayList<Integer>();            }            //å°†ç¬¬i[0]ä½ç½®çš„å…ƒç´ å­˜åˆ°ç¬¬i[0]ä½ç½®çš„é“¾è¡¨            graphList[i[0]].add(i[1]);        }        return graphList;    }    //å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢    /*    private boolean bfs(List<Integer>[] graphList,int start,int target,boolean[] marked){        //ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—å­˜èƒ½åˆ°è¾¾çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹        LinkedList<Integer> queue = new LinkedList<>();        //å°†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œå¹¶å°†åˆ¤é‡æ•°ç»„å¯¹åº”çš„ä¸‹æ ‡ä½ç½®è®¾ä¸ºtrue        queue.add(start);        marked[start]=true;        while (!queue.isEmpty()){            int node = queue.poll();            if (graphList[node]==null)                continue;            for (Integer next:graphList[node]){                if (next==target)                    return true;                if (marked[next]){                    continue;                }                marked[next]=true;                queue.add(next);            }        }        return false;    }    *///æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢    private boolean dfs(List<Integer>[] graphList,int start,int target,boolean[] marked){        List<Integer> list =graphList[start];        if (list==null)            return false;        for (int i:list){            if (!marked[i]){                if (i==target)                    return true;                marked[i]=true;                if (dfs(graphList,i,target,marked))                    return true;            }        }        return false;    }}

å‘ç°äº†ä¸€ä¸ªåªæœ‰3msçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒæŠŠstarté‚£ä¸ªä½ç½®è®¾ä¸ºtrueï¼Œä»è¿™å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå¯¹èƒ½åˆ°è¾¾çš„ç‚¹è®¾ä¸ºtrueï¼Œå†å°†å…¶èƒ½åˆ°è¾¾çš„ç‚¹æ‰€èƒ½åˆ°è¾¾çš„é‚£äº›ç‚¹ä¹Ÿè®¾ä¸ºtrueã€‚

class Solution {    public boolean findWhetherExistsPath(int n, int[][] graph, int start, int target) {        // è·¯å¾„å¯è¾¾        boolean[] dp = new boolean[n];        for (int[] node : graph) {            // è‹¥å‡ºå‘åœ°ä¸ºstart åˆ™è®¾ç½®å‡ºå‘åœ°åˆ°ç›®çš„åœ°å¯è¾¾            dp[node[0]] = node[0] == start;        }        for (int[] node : graph) {            if(dp[node[0]]) {                dp[node[1]] = true;            }        }        //éœ€è¦å†æ‰§è¡Œä¸€éï¼Œå¦åˆ™éå†è¿‡çš„ç‚¹å†ä¸ºtrueå°±ä¸èƒ½éå†äº†ï¼Œå¦‚[2,3][3,1][1,4],start=2ï¼Œ2ä¸ºtrueï¼Œ3ä¸ºtrueï¼Œ1ä¸ºtrueï¼Œåªéå†ä¸€é4å°±æ— æ³•è®¾ä¸ºtrueã€‚        for (int[] node : graph) {            if(dp[node[0]]) {                dp[node[1]] = true;            }        }        return dp[target];    }}

25.æœ€å°é«˜åº¦æ ‘

æ€è·¯ï¼šæœ‰åºæ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ¯æ¬¡é€‰æœ€ä¸­é—´çš„æ•°ä¸ºæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå·¦è¾¹å¤åˆ¶ä¸ºæ–°æ•°ç»„æœ€ä¸­é—´ä¸ºå·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå³è¾¹å¤åˆ¶ä¸ºæ–°æ•°ç»„æœ€ä¸­é—´ä¸ºå³èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œé€’å½’ã€‚

class Solution {    public TreeNode sortedArrayToBST(int[] nums) {        int l =nums.length;        int mid = l/2;        if (l==0)            return null;        TreeNode node = new TreeNode(nums[mid]);        node.left=sortedArrayToBST(Arrays.copyOfRange(nums,0,mid));        node.right=sortedArrayToBST(Arrays.copyOfRange(nums,mid+1,l));        return node;    }}

ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼šå¤åˆ¶ä¸ºæ–°æ•°ç»„å½±å“æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œç”¨leftå’Œrightæ ‡è®°å·¦å³æ–°æ•°ç»„ä¸­é—´çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚

class Solution {    public TreeNode sortedArrayToBST(int[] nums) {        return sortedArrayToBST(nums,0,nums.length-1);    }    public TreeNode sortedArrayToBST(int[] nums,int left,int right){        if (left>right)            return null;        int mid = (left+right+1)/2;        TreeNode node = new TreeNode(nums[mid]);        node.left=sortedArrayToBST(nums,left,mid-1);        node.right=sortedArrayToBST(nums,mid+1,right);        return node;    }}

26.ç‰¹å®šæ·±åº¦èŠ‚ç‚¹é“¾è¡¨

æ€è·¯ï¼šå±‚æ¬¡éå†ï¼Œç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¿å­˜ä¸€å±‚çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæœ€åè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯é“¾è¡¨æ•°ç»„ï¼Œç”±äºä¸çŸ¥é“æ ‘æ·±ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ— æ³•ç›´æ¥å®šä¹‰é“¾è¡¨æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å…ˆç”¨å­˜é“¾è¡¨çš„é“¾è¡¨ï¼Œæœ€åå†è½¬æˆæ•°ç»„ã€‚

class Solution {    public ListNode[] listOfDepth(TreeNode tree) {        if (tree==null)            return null;        List<ListNode> list = new ArrayList<>();        Queue<TreeNode> queue = new LinkedList<>();        queue.offer(tree);        while (!queue.isEmpty()){            //è¿™ä¸€å±‚èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°            int size =queue.size();            //headä¸ºå¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œrearç”¨äºå°¾æ’            ListNode head =null;            ListNode rear =null;            for (int i=0;i<size;i++){                //æ¯æ¬¡å‡ºé˜Ÿä¸€ä¸ªæ ‘èŠ‚ç‚¹                TreeNode p = queue.poll();                //ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºå¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹                if (i==0){                     head = new ListNode(p.val);                     rear =head;                }else{                    ListNode cur =new ListNode(p.val);                    rear.next=cur;                    rear=cur;                }                //å°†å½“å‰æ ‘èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å·¦å³å­©å­å…¥é˜Ÿ                if (p.left!=null){                    queue.add(p.left);                }                if (p.right!=null){                    queue.add(p.right);                }            }            //å°†è¿™ä¸€å±‚çš„å•é“¾è¡¨å…¥é“¾            list.add(head);        }        //è½¬æˆæ•°ç»„//        ListNode[] res = new ListNode[list.size()];//        int i=0;//        for (ListNode node:list){//            res[i++]=node;//        }//        return res;        return list.toArray(new ListNode[list.size()]);    }}

ä¸Šé¢ç”¨forå¾ªç¯æ¥å¤„ç†ä¸€å±‚ï¼Œä¸‹é¢ç”¨sizeæ¥æ§åˆ¶ä¸€å±‚

class Solution {    public ListNode[] listOfDepth(TreeNode tree) {        if (tree==null)            return null;        List<ListNode> list = new ArrayList<>();        Queue<TreeNode> queue = new LinkedList<>();        queue.offer(tree);        int size =1;        ListNode head =new ListNode(-1);        ListNode rear=head;        while (!queue.isEmpty()){            if (size>0){                size--;                TreeNode t = queue.poll();                ListNode cur =new ListNode(t.val);                rear.next=cur;                rear=cur;                if (t.left!=null) {                    queue.add(t.left);                }                if (t.right!=null)                    queue.add(t.right);            }else{                //å¦‚æœsizeç­‰äº0åˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºä¸Šä¸€å±‚èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½åŠ å…¥åˆ°é“¾è¡¨ä¸­äº†ï¼Œéœ€è¦å°†è¿™ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨åŠ å…¥åˆ°listä¸­                //ç„¶åå½“å‰é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸‹ä¸€å±‚çš„ï¼Œé‡æ–°ç»´æŠ¤ä¸€ä¸ªsizeã€‚                list.add(head.next);                //éœ€è¦å°†rearå†å›åˆ°å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹                rear=head;                size=queue.size();            }        }        //è·³å‡ºwhileå¾ªç¯ï¼Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨æ²¡åŠ åˆ°listä¸­        list.add(head.next);        //è½¬æˆæ•°ç»„        ListNode[] res = new ListNode[list.size()];        int i=0;        for (ListNode node:list){            res[i++]=node;        }        return res;    }}

27.æ£€æŸ¥å¹³è¡¡æ€§

æ€è·¯ï¼šæ ¹ç»“ç‚¹æ»¡è¶³å·¦å³å­æ ‘é«˜åº¦å·®ä¸å¤§äº1ï¼Œå·¦å­©å­ä¹Ÿæ»¡è¶³ï¼Œå³å­©å­ä¹Ÿæ»¡è¶³ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½è¿”å›trueï¼Œé€’å½’æ±‚é«˜åº¦ã€‚

class Solution {    public boolean isBalanced(TreeNode root) {        if (root==null)            return true;        if (Math.abs(depth(root.left)-depth(root.right))<=1&&isBalanced(root.left)&&isBalanced(root.right))            return true;        return false;    }    public int depth(TreeNode root){        if (root==null)            return 0;        return Math.max(depth(root.left),depth(root.right))+1;    }}

ä¸Šé¢ç›¸å½“äºä»æ ¹ç»“ç‚¹å¾€ä¸‹æ£€æŸ¥æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦éƒ½å¹³è¡¡ï¼Œä¼šé‡å¤æ±‚æ ‘é«˜ï¼Œä»ä¸‹å¾€ä¸Šæ±‚å°±ä¸ä¼šé‡å¤ã€‚

ç›´æ¥é€’å½’åˆ°æœ€ä¸‹é¢çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ¤æ–­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦æ»¡è¶³å¹³è¡¡æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡å¿—ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¸æ»¡è¶³å¹³è¡¡æ¡ä»¶å°±å°†

æ ‡å¿—è®¾ä¸ºfalseï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ï¼Œä¸å†è¿›è¡Œåé¢é€’å½’çš„è®¡ç®—ã€‚

class Solution {    private boolean flag = true;    public boolean isBalanced(TreeNode root) {        depth(root);        return flag;    }    public int depth(TreeNode root){        //ä¸ç¬¦åˆå¹³è¡¡æ¡ä»¶é€’å½’ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ä¸éœ€è¦åé¢çš„è®¡ç®—        if (!flag)            return 0;        if (root==null)            return 0;        int left=depth(root.left);        int right=depth(root.right);        if (Math.abs(left-right)>1){            flag=false;        }        //å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹é«˜åº¦        return Math.max(left,right)+1;    }}

æ€è·¯ï¼šäºŒå‰æœç´¢æ ‘ç‰¹ç‚¹è¦ä¹ˆæ˜¯ç©ºæ ‘ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆå·¦å­æ ‘ä¸ç©ºï¼Œæ ¹ç»“ç‚¹éƒ½å¤§äºå·¦å­æ ‘çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå³å­æ ‘ä¸ç©ºæ ¹ç»“ç‚¹å°äºå³å­æ ‘èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚å·¦å³å­æ ‘ä¹Ÿæ˜¯äºŒå‰æ’åºæ ‘ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åªéœ€è¦ä¸­åºéå†åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åˆ—å³å¯ã€‚

æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹[-2147483648]è¶…è¿‡intå‹é•¿åº¦ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç”¨long.

class Solution {    public boolean isValidBST(TreeNode root) {        LinkedList<Integer> list = new LinkedList<>();        helper(list,root);        for (int i=0;i<list.size()-1;i++){            if (list.get(i)>=list.get(i+1))                return false;        }        return true;    }    public void helper(LinkedList<Integer> list, TreeNode root){        if (root ==null)            return;        if (root.left!=null)            helper(list,root.left);        list.add(root.val);        if (root.right!=null)            helper(list,root.right);    }}

æ”¹è¿›ï¼šä¸éœ€è¦é¢å¤–ç©ºé—´å­˜ä¸­åºéå†ç»“æœï¼Œåªéœ€è¦åœ¨éå†çš„åŒæ—¶æ¯”è¾ƒå‰åçš„å€¼ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªå…¨å±€æ ‡å¿—æ¥è®°å½•æ˜¯å¦ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶ã€‚

class Solution {    boolean flag = true;    long cur = Long.MIN_VALUE;    public boolean isValidBST(TreeNode root) {        helper(root);        return flag;    }    public void helper(TreeNode root){        if (root ==null)            return;        helper(root.left);        int pre=root.val;        if (cur<pre&&flag)            cur=pre;        else{            flag=false;            return;        }        helper(root.right);    }}

class Solution {    public boolean isValidBST(TreeNode root) {        Stack<TreeNode> stack = new Stack<TreeNode>();        long pre =Long.MIN_VALUE;        TreeNode cur=root;        while (cur!=null||!stack.isEmpty()){            if (cur!=null){                stack.push(cur);                cur=cur.left;            }else {                cur=stack.pop();                //preå­˜çš„æ˜¯å‰é¢çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼ï¼Œcuræ˜¯åé¢çš„å€¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯äºŒå‰æœç´¢æ ‘åº”è¯¥æ¯”curå°                if (cur.val<=pre)                    return false;                pre=cur.val;                cur=cur.right;            }        }        return true;    }}

æ€è·¯ï¼šç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„è¡¨ç¤ºä¸‰ä¸ªæ ˆï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ ˆéœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ ˆé¡¶æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œç”¨æ¥åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ ˆæ»¡ï¼Œèƒ½å¦å‹æ ˆå¼¹æ ˆã€‚å¯ä»¥å°†æ•°ç»„ç©ºé—´è®¾ä¸º3+3stackSizeåˆ†å››æ®µï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€æ®µä¸‹æ ‡0-2å¯¹åº”stackNumï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºä¸‰ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å½“å‰å­˜æ•°æ®é•¿åº¦ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒæ®µè¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ ˆä¸‹æ ‡3-2+stackSizeï¼Œç¬¬ä¸‰æ®µè¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæ ˆä¸‹æ ‡3+stackSize-2+2stackSize,ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªæ ˆä¸‹æ ‡3+2stackSize-2+3stackSizeã€‚æ ˆä¸‹æ ‡å¼€å§‹é€šå¼3+stackNum*stackSizeï¼Œstack[stack[stackNum]+3+stackNum*stackSize]è¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰æ ˆçš„æ ˆé¡¶çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ“ä½œä½ç½®ã€‚

class TripleInOne {    private int[]stack;    private int stackSize;    public TripleInOne(int stackSize) {        this.stackSize=stackSize;        stack = new int[3+3*stackSize];    }    public void push(int stackNum, int value) {        if (stack[stackNum]>=stackSize)            return;        stack[stack[stackNum]+3+stackNum*stackSize]=value;        stack[stackNum]++;        return;    }    public int pop(int stackNum) {        if (stack[stackNum]==0)            return -1;        stack[stackNum]--;        return stack[stack[stackNum]+3+stackNum*stackSize];    }    public int peek(int stackNum) {        if (stack[stackNum]==0)            return -1;        return stack[stack[stackNum]-1+3+stackNum*stackSize];    }    public boolean isEmpty(int stackNum) {        if (stack[stackNum]==0)            return true;        return false;    }}

class TripleInOne {    private int[]stack;    private int stackSize;    public TripleInOne(int stackSize) {        this.stackSize=stackSize;        stack = new int[3+3*stackSize];    }    public int len(int stackNum,int stackSize){        int l = stack[stackNum]+3+stackNum*stackSize;        return l;    }    public void push(int stackNum, int value) {        if (stack[stackNum]>=stackSize)            return;        stack[len(stackNum,stackSize)]=value;        stack[stackNum]++;        return;    }    public int pop(int stackNum) {        if (stack[stackNum]==0)            return -1;        stack[stackNum]--;        return stack[len(stackNum,stackSize)];    }    public int peek(int stackNum) {        if (stack[stackNum]==0)            return -1;        return stack[len(stackNum,stackSize)-1];    }    public boolean isEmpty(int stackNum) {        if (stack[stackNum]==0)            return true;        return false;    }}

æ€è·¯ï¼šç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ ˆçš„æ ˆé¡¶æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚å¦‚æœxæ¯”æ ˆé¡¶å°åˆ™å‹å…¥xï¼Œå¦åˆ™åˆ™å†ä¸€æ¬¡å‹å…¥æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ã€‚å‡ºæ ˆä¸¤ä¸ªæ ˆåŒæ­¥å‡ºå°±å¯ä»¥ã€‚

class MinStack {    private Stack<Integer> stack ;    private Stack<Integer> minstack;    /** initialize your data structure here. */    public MinStack() {        stack =new Stack<>();        minstack = new Stack<>();    }    public void push(int x) {        stack.push(x);        if (minstack.size()<1){            minstack.push(x);        }else{            if (x<minstack.peek()){                minstack.push(x);            }else                minstack.push(minstack.peek());        }    }    public void pop() {        stack.pop();        minstack.pop();    }    public int top() {        return stack.peek();    }    public int getMin() {        return minstack.peek();    }}

å¯ä»¥ç”¨é“¾è¡¨æ¥å­˜æœ€å°å€¼ä¼šå¿«ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œæ€è·¯å’Œä¸Šé¢ä¸€æ ·ã€‚

class MinStack {    class Node {        int val;        int min;        Node next;        public Node(int val, int min) {            this.val = val;            this.min = min;        }        public Node(int val, int min, Node next) {            this.val = val;            this.min = min;            this.next = next;        }    }    private Node head = null;    /** initialize your data structure here. */    public MinStack() {    }    public void push(int x) {        if (head == null)             head = new Node(x, x);        else {            int min = Math.min(x, head.min);            Node node = new Node(x, min, head);            head = node;        }    }    public void pop() {        if (head == null)             return;        head = head.next;    }    public int top() {        return head.val;    }    public int getMin() {        return head.min;    }}

é•¿åº¦ä¸ç¡®å®šéœ€è¦åšåˆ°åŠ¨æ€æ·»åŠ ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°æŒ‡å®šç´¢å¼•çš„å…ƒç´ å¹¶åˆ é™¤ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„æœ‰æ ˆï¼ŒArrayListç­‰

class StackOfPlates {    private Stack<Stack<Integer>> stacks ;    private int cap;    private Stack<Integer> stack;//æ”¾åœ¨æ–¹æ³•å¤–å¯ä»¥æé«˜æ•ˆç‡    public StackOfPlates(int cap) {        this.cap=cap;        stacks = new Stack<>();    }    public void push(int val) {        if (cap==0)            return;        if (stacks.size()==0||stacks.peek().size()==cap){             stack =new Stack<>();            stack.push(val);            stacks.push(stack);        }else{            //æ²¡æœ‰è¶…è¿‡å®¹é‡ï¼Œåœ¨stacksæ ˆé¡¶çš„æ ˆè¿›è¡Œå‹æ ˆ            stacks.peek().push(val);        }    }    //stacksæ ˆé¡¶æ ˆå‡ºæ ˆ    public int pop() {        if (stacks.size()==0)            return -1;        //å…ˆå°†æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ å‡ºæ ˆï¼Œå¦‚æœå‡ºæ ˆå®Œæ ˆç©ºäº†éœ€è¦åœ¨stacksä¸­åˆ é™¤è¯¥æ ˆã€‚        int a =stacks.peek().pop();        if (stacks.peek().size()==0){            stacks.pop();        }        return a;    }    public int popAt(int index) {        //æ³¨æ„åˆ¤æ–­indexçš„åˆæ³•æ€§        if (index>=stacks.size()||stacks.size()==0){            return -1;        }        //å…ˆå°†æŒ‡å®šç´¢å¼•ä½ç½®æ ˆçš„æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ å‡ºæ ˆï¼Œå†åˆ¤æ–­æ ˆæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œç©ºåˆ™ç”¨æ ˆçš„remove()æ–¹æ³•åˆ é™¤ï¼Œåé¢ç´¢å¼•ä¼šå‰ç§»        int l=stacks.get(index).pop();        if (stacks.get(index).size()==0){            stacks.remove(index);        }        return l;    }}
class StackOfPlates {    private ArrayList<Stack<Integer>> stacks;    private int capacity;    public StackOfPlates(int cap) {        this.stacks = new ArrayList<Stack<Integer>>();        this.capacity = cap;    }    public void push(int val) {        if (capacity <= 0)            return;        Stack last = getLastStack();        if (last != null && last.size() < capacity) {            last.push(val);        } else {            Stack<Integer> newStack = new Stack<Integer>();            newStack.push(val);            stacks.add(newStack);        }    }    public int pop() {        return popAt(stacks.size() - 1);    }    public int popAt(int index) {        if (index < 0 || index >= stacks.size()) {            return -1;        }        Stack<Integer> stack = stacks.get(index);        if (stack.size() == 0)            return -1;        int val = stack.pop();        if (stack.size() == 0) {            stacks.remove(index);        }        return val;    }    public Stack getLastStack() {        if (stacks.size() == 0)            return null;        return stacks.get(stacks.size() - 1);    }

class MyQueue {    Stack<Integer> stack1 ;    Stack<Integer> stack2 ;    /** Initialize your data structure here. */    public MyQueue() {        stack1 = new Stack<>();        stack2 = new Stack<>();    }    /** Push element x to the back of queue. */    public void push(int x) {        stack1.push(x);    }    /** Removes the element from in front of queue and returns that element. */    public int pop() {        peek();        return stack2.pop();    }    /** Get the front element. */    public int peek() {        if (empty())            return -1;        //stack2ä¸ºç©ºæ—¶æ‰å°†stack1ä¸­å…ƒç´ å‹è¿‡æ¥ï¼Œå› ä¸ºstack2ä¸­å…ƒç´ éƒ½æ¯”stack1ä¸­å…ƒç´ å…ˆè¿›å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚        if (stack2.isEmpty()){            while (!stack1.isEmpty()){                stack2.push(stack1.pop());            }        }        return stack2.peek();    }    /** Returns whether the queue is empty. */    public boolean empty() {        return stack1.isEmpty()&&stack2.isEmpty();    }}

class SortedStack {    private Stack<Integer>stack1 ;    private Stack<Integer>stack2 ;    public SortedStack() {        stack1=new Stack<>();        stack2=new Stack<>();    }    public void push(int val) {        if (stack1.isEmpty()){            stack1.push(val);            return;        }        //!stack1.isEmpty()&&stack1.peek()<valä¸å¯ä»¥é¢ å€’        while (!stack1.isEmpty()&&stack1.peek()<val){            stack2.push(stack1.pop());        }        stack1.push(val);        while (!stack2.isEmpty()){            stack1.push(stack2.pop());        }    }    public void pop() {        if (stack1.isEmpty())            return;        stack1.pop();    }    public int peek() {        if (stack1.isEmpty())            return -1;        return stack1.peek();    }    public boolean isEmpty() {        return stack1.isEmpty();    }}

class SortedStack {    private Stack<Integer>stack1 ;    private Stack<Integer>stack2 ;    public SortedStack() {        stack1=new Stack<>();        stack2=new Stack<>();    }    public void push(int val) {        if (stack1.empty()) {            stack1.push(val);            return;        }        if (stack1.peek() < val) {            while (!stack1.empty() && stack1.peek() < val) {                stack2.push(stack1.pop());            }        } else{            while (!stack2.empty() && stack2.peek() > val) {                stack1.push(stack2.pop());            }        }        stack1.push(val);    }    public void pop() {        while (!stack2.empty()){            stack1.push(stack2.pop());        }        if (stack1.empty()) {            return;        }        stack1.pop();    }    public int peek() {        while (!stack2.empty()){            stack1.push(stack2.pop());        }        if (stack1.empty())            return -1;        return stack1.peek();    }    public boolean isEmpty() {        return stack1.empty();    }}

class AnimalShelf {    private List<int[]> linkedList ;    private int[] a ={-1,-1};    public AnimalShelf() {        linkedList=new LinkedList<>();    }    public void enqueue(int[] animal) {        linkedList.add(animal);    }    public int[] dequeueAny() {        if (linkedList.size()==0)            return a;        return linkedList.poll();    }    public int[] dequeueDog() {        //å…ˆåˆ¤æ–­é“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºå¯ä»¥æé«˜æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œè™½ç„¶è¿™ä¸ªifå¯çœ        if (linkedList.size()==0)            return a;        for (int i=0;i<linkedList.size();i++){            //linkedList.get(i)è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„            if (linkedList.get(i)[1]==1){                int[]b = linkedList.get(i);                linkedList.remove(i);                return b ;            }        }        return a;    }    public int[] dequeueCat() {        if (linkedList.size()==0)            return a;        for (int i=0;i<linkedList.size();i++){            if (linkedList.get(i)[1]==0){                int[]b =linkedList.get(i);                linkedList.remove(i);                return b;            }        }        return a;    }}

14.é“¾è¡¨æ±‚å’Œ

æ€è·¯ï¼šå…ˆå°†ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨è½¬æˆæ•´æ•°ï¼Œç„¶åç›¸åŠ å†è½¬æˆé“¾è¡¨ã€‚è¿™ç§æ–¹æ³•è¿‡ä¸äº†ï¼Œå› ä¸ºé“¾è¡¨å¯èƒ½éå¸¸é•¿ï¼Œè¶…è¿‡ç±»å‹èƒ½è¡¨ç¤ºçš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚

ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨å¯¹åº”ä½ç½®ç›¸åŠ ï¼Œæ¨¡10å–ä½™æ–°å»ºèŠ‚ç‚¹å°¾æ’ï¼Œè¿›ä½åŠ åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ç»„ã€‚æœ‰ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µï¼š

â€‹ 1.ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ç›¸åŒï¼Œéœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æœ€åè¿›ä½äº†ï¼Œè¿›ä½äº†éœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºå€¼ä¸º1çš„æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹

â€‹ 2.ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ä¸åŒï¼Œä¹Ÿéœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­æœ€åæ˜¯å¦è¿›ä½äº†ï¼Œæ·»åŠ èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

è¿™ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µåœ¨æœ€åä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨éƒ½è¯»åˆ°ç»“å°¾å¤„ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡åˆ¤æ–­æ·»åŠ å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚

class Solution {    public ListNode addTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {        int sum=0;        //aè¡¨ç¤ºä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç›¸åŠ è¿›ä½çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œåªèƒ½æ˜¯0æˆ–1        int a=0;        ListNode node = new ListNode(-1);        ListNode q=node;        while (l1!=null&&l2!=null){            sum=l1.val+l2.val;            ListNode p = new ListNode((sum+a)%10);            a=(sum+a)/10;            q.next=p;            q=p;            l1=l1.next;            l2=l2.next;        }        while (l1!=null){            //l1.valæœ€å¤§9ï¼Œa1æˆ–0ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›¸åŠ æœ‰å¯èƒ½è¿›ä½            ListNode p = new ListNode((l1.val+a)%10);            a=(l1.val+a)/10;            q.next=p;            q=p;            l1=l1.next;        }        while (l2!=null){            ListNode p = new ListNode((l2.val+a)%10);            a=(l2.val+a)/10;            q.next=p;            q=p;            l2=l2.next;        }        //å¦‚æœä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ç›¸åŒä¸”æœ€åä¸¤ä¸ªå’Œè¿›ä½ä¸ä¸º0ï¼Œæ·»åŠ è¿›ä½ä¸ºæ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚        if (a!=0){            ListNode p = new ListNode(a);            q.next=p;            q=p;        }        q.next=null;        return node.next;    }}

class Solution {    public ListNode addTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {        return add(l1,l2,0);    }    ListNode add(ListNode l1,ListNode l2,int rabit){        //å¾ªç¯ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶æ˜¯é“¾è¡¨éƒ½è¯»å®Œï¼Œä¸”æ²¡æœ‰è¿›ä½ã€‚        if(l1==null && l2==null && rabit==0) return null;        if(l1==null && l2==null && rabit>0) return new ListNode(rabit);        int num1 =0,num2=0;        if(l1!=null){            num1 = l1.val;        }        if(l2!=null){            num2 = l2.val;        }        int num = (num1+num2+rabit)%10;        rabit  = (num1+num2+rabit)/10;        ListNode node = new ListNode(num);        if(l1!=null){            l1 = l1.next;        }else{            l1 =null;        }        if(l2!=null){            l2 = l2.next;        }else{            l2 = null;        }        ListNode node2 = add(l1,l2,rabit);        node.next = node2;        return node;    }}

class Solution {    public boolean isPalindrome(ListNode head) {        //å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆpä¸€æ¬¡è¯»ä¸¤ä¸ªï¼Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆqä¸€æ¬¡è¯»ä¸€ä¸ª        ListNode p = head;        ListNode q = head;        ListNode r = null;        ListNode t = null;        while (p!=null&&p.next!=null){            p=p.next.next;            r=q;            q=q.next;            //å¤´æ’å‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†            r.next=t;            t=r;        }        //pæ¯æ¬¡è¯»ä¸¤ä¸ªï¼Œå¦‚æœé“¾è¡¨ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™pæŒ‡å‘æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®ï¼ŒqæŒ‡å‘æœ€ä¸­é—´çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚        //å¦‚æœé“¾è¡¨ä¸ºå¶æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™pæŒ‡å‘null,qæŒ‡å‘ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªã€‚        if (p!=null){            //ä»ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå¼€å§‹æ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ç§æƒ…å†µéœ€è¦å°†qåç§»ä¸€ä½ã€‚            q=q.next;        }        while (q!=null){            if (q.val!=t.val)                return false;            else {                q=q.next;                t=t.next;            }        }        return true;    }}

public class Solution {    public ListNode getIntersectionNode(ListNode headA, ListNode headB) {        ListNode p = headA;        ListNode q = headB;        while (p != q) {            p = p == null ? headB : p.next;            q = q == null ? headA : q.next;        }        return p;    }}
public class Solution {    public ListNode getIntersectionNode(ListNode headA, ListNode headB) {        ListNode p = headA;        ListNode q = headB;        int l1 = 0, l2 = 0;        while (p != null) {            p = p.next;            l1++;        }        while (q != null) {            q = q.next;            l2++;        }        int l = Math.abs(l1 - l2);        for (int i = 0; i < l; i++) {            if (l1 > l2) {                headA = headA.next;            } else                headB = headB.next;        }        while (headA != headB) {            headA = headA.next;            headB = headB.next;        }        return headA;    }}

public class Solution {    public ListNode detectCycle(ListNode head) {        ListNode p = head;        ListNode q = head;        while (q!=null&&q.next!=null){            p=p.next;            q=q.next.next;            if (p==q){                q=head;                while (p!=q){                    q=q.next;                    p=p.next;                }                return p;            }        }        return null;    }}

public class Solution {    public ListNode detectCycle(ListNode head) {        if (head == null)            return head;        ListNode p = head;        ListNode q = p.next;        ListNode r = p.next;        while (true){            p.next=null;            if (r==p){                p.next = q;                //System.out.println(p.val);                return p;            }            if (r==null){                p.next = q;                //System.out.println(r.val);                return r;            }            r=r.next;            if (r==q){                p.next=q;                p=q;                q=p.next;                r=p.next;            }        }    }}

class Solution {    public ListNode removeDuplicateNodes(ListNode head) {        if (head==null)            return null;        ListNode pre =head;        ListNode next=head;        Set set = new HashSet();        set.add(pre.val);        while (pre.next!=null){            next=pre.next;            if (set.contains(next.val)){                pre.next=next.next;            }else{                set.add(next.val);                pre=next;            }                    }        return head;    }}

class Solution {    public int kthToLast(ListNode head, int k) {        ListNode p = head;        int i=0;        while (p!=null){            i++;            p=p.next;        }        p=head;        for (int j=1;j<i-k+1;j++){            p=p.next;        }        return p.val;    }}

class Solution {    public int kthToLast(ListNode head, int k) {        ListNode p = head;        ListNode q = head;        for (int i=0;i<k;i++){            q=q.next;        }        while (q!=null){            q=q.next;            p=p.next;        }        return p.val;    }}

13.åˆ†å‰²é“¾è¡¨

æ€è·¯ï¼šè¿™é¢˜ç›®ï¼Œè¯»äº†å¥½å‡ éä¹Ÿæ²¡çœ‹æ‡‚è¿™ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªè¾“å‡ºï¼Ÿæš‚ä¸”ç†è§£ä¸ºé¡ºåºéå†åªè¦æ‰¾åˆ°æ¯”åŸºå‡†å°çš„å°±å’Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§äºæˆ–ç­‰äºåŸºå‡†çš„äº¤æ¢ã€‚æµ‹è¯•ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨ä¾‹è¾“å‡ºä¸ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œæäº¤å±…ç„¶é€šè¿‡äº†ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼æ‰€ä»¥è¿™ä¸ªè¾“å‡ºä¸å”¯ä¸€ï¼Œåªè¦æ»¡è¶³ä¸Šé¢æ¡ä»¶å°±å¯ä»¥ï¼Ÿè«åå…¶å¦™ã€‚

class Solution {    public ListNode partition(ListNode head, int x) {        ListNode p = head;        ListNode pre = p;        int t =0;        while (p!=null){            if (p.val<x){                t=pre.val;                pre.val=p.val;                p.val=t;                pre=pre.next;            }            p=p.next;        }        return head;    }}

ç»è¿‡å‡ æ¬¡å°è¯•ç»ˆäºå¯èƒ½ç†è§£äº†ï¼ŒåŠ›æ‰£çš„ç¤ºä¾‹æœ‰é—®é¢˜ï¼Œ

class Solution {    public ListNode partition(ListNode head, int x) {        if (head==null||head.next==null)           return head;        ListNode p = head.next;        ListNode q = p.next;        ListNode node=new ListNode(-1);        node.next=head;        head.next=null;        //å¯¹äºç¬¬äºŒä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œåªæœ‰å½“head.val<x&&p.val>=xæ—¶æ‰æ”¾åˆ°headåé¢ï¼Œ        // å…¶ä»–ä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µéƒ½æ˜¯æ”¾åˆ°headå‰é¢ã€‚        if (head.val<x&&p.val>=x){            p.next=head.next;            head.next=p;        }else {            p.next=node.next;            node.next=p;        }        while (q!=null){            p=q;            q=q.next;            //æ¯”xå°å°±å¤´æ’åˆ°nodeåï¼Œå¤§äºç­‰äºxå°±å¤´æ’åˆ°headå            if (p.val<x){                p.next=node.next;                node.next=p;            }else {                p.next=head.next;                head.next=p;            }        }        return node.next;    }}

6.å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‹ç¼©

æ€è·¯ï¼šå¯ä»¥ç”¨æ•°ç»„å­˜å‹ç¼©åçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œéå†æ¯”è¾ƒç›¸é‚»çš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œç›¸åŒåˆ™è®¡æ•°å™¨åŠ 1ï¼Œä¸åŒåˆ™å°†å½“å‰è®¡æ•°å™¨å­˜åˆ°æ•°ç»„ï¼Œç»§ç»­æ¯”è¾ƒä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªã€‚

class Solution {    public String compressString(String S) {        //å¦‚æœé•¿åº¦ä¸º1æˆ–ç©ºè‚¯å®šè¿”å›åŸå­—ç¬¦ä¸²        if (S.length()<=1)            return S;        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder().append(S.charAt(0));        int j=1;        for (int i=1;i<S.length();i++){            if (S.charAt(i)==S.charAt(i-1))                j++;            else{                sb.append(j).append(S.charAt(i));                j=1;            }        }        return sb.append(j).length()<S.length()?sb.toString():S;    }}

class Solution {    public String compressString(String S){            int N=S.length();            int i=0;            StringBuilder sb=new StringBuilder();            while(i<N){            int j=i;            while(j<N &&S.charAt(j)==S.charAt(i)){            j++;            }            sb.append(S.charAt(i));            sb.append(j-i);            i=j;            }        return sb.length()<S.length()?sb.toString():S;    }}

class Solution {    public void rotate(int[][] matrix) {        int l=matrix.length;        for (int i=0;i<l-1;i++){            for (int j=0;j<=i&&j<l-1-i;j++){                int t=matrix[i][j];                matrix[i][j]=matrix[l-1-j][i];                matrix[l-1-j][i]=matrix[l-1-i][l-1-j];                matrix[l-1-i][l-1-j]=matrix[j][l-1-i];                matrix[j][l-1-i]=t;            }        }    }}

class Solution {    public void rotate(int[][] matrix) {        int n = matrix.length;        //çŸ©é˜µè½¬ç½®ï¼Œå³æŒ‰æ–œå¯¹è§’çº¿è¿›è¡Œæ•°æ®äº¤æ¢        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){            for(int j=i;j<n;j++){                int temp = matrix[i][j];                matrix[i][j] = matrix[j][i];                matrix[j][i] = temp;            }        }        //çŸ©é˜µæ ¹æ®ä¸­é—´åˆ—è¿›è¡Œå¯¹æŠ˜ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°æœ€ç»ˆç»“æœ        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){            for(int j=0;j<n/2;j++){                int temp = matrix[i][j];                matrix[i][j] = matrix[i][n-j-1];                matrix[i][n-j-1] = temp;            }        }    }}

class Solution {    public void setZeroes(int[][] matrix) {        int m = matrix.length;        int n = matrix[0].length;        HashSet set1 = new HashSet<>();        //HashSet set2 = new HashSet<>();ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆå°±å¯ä»¥        for (int i=0;i<m;i++){            for (int j=0; j<n;j++){                if (matrix[i][j]==0){                    set1.add(i);                    set1.add(j+m);                }            }        }        for (int i=0;i<m;i++){            for (int j=0;j<n;j++){                if (set1.contains(i)||set1.contains(j+m)){                    matrix[i][j]=0;                }            }        }    }}

ä¸Šé¢æ–¹æ³•ç”¨é›†åˆè¿è¡Œå¤ªæ…¢ã€‚æ¢æˆå¸ƒå°”æ•°ç»„å¿«2ms,æƒ³æ³•æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ã€‚

class Solution {    public void setZeroes(int[][] matrix) {        boolean[] line = new boolean[matrix.length];        boolean[] column = new boolean[matrix[0].length];        // æ‰¾å‡ºè¦æ¸…é›¶çš„è¡Œåˆ—        for (int i = 0; i < matrix.length; i++) {            for (int j = 0; j < matrix[0].length; j++) {                if (matrix[i][j] == 0) {                    line[i] = true;                    column[j] = true;                }            }        }        // å¼€å§‹å¯¹è¡Œæ¸…é›¶        for (int i = 0; i < matrix.length; i++) {            if (line[i]) {                for (int j = 0; j < matrix[0].length; j++) {                    matrix[i][j] = 0;                }            }        }        // å¼€å§‹å¯¹åˆ—æ¸…é›¶        for (int i = 0; i < matrix[0].length; i++) {            if (column[i]) {                for (int j = 0; j < matrix.length; j++) {                    matrix[j][i] = 0;                }            }        }    }}

class Solution {    public boolean isFlipedString(String s1, String s2) {        if (s1.length()!=s2.length()) {            return false;        }        if (s1.length()==0)            return true;        int l= s1.length();        for (int i=0;i<l;i++){            if (s1.charAt(i) ==s2.charAt(0)){                if (s1.substring(i,l).equals(s2.substring(0,l-i))&&                    s1.substring(0,i).equals(s2.substring(l-i,l))){                    return true;                }            }        }        return false;    }}

å°†s1ä¸s1æ‹¼æ¥æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œåˆ™å¦‚æœç¬¦åˆé¢˜æ„ï¼Œs2å¿…å®šæ˜¯æ–°ä¸²çš„å­ä¸²ã€‚

class Solution {    public boolean isFlipedString(String s1, String s2) {        if (s1.length()!=s2.length())            return false;        return (s1+s1).contains(s2);    }}

class Solution {     public boolean isUnique(String astr) {         int l = astr.length();          String temp;          for (int i=0;i<l;i++){              temp=astr;              if ((temp.replace(String.valueOf(temp.charAt(i)),"")).length()!=l-1)                  return false;          }          return  true;      } }

class Solution {    public boolean CheckPermutation(String s1, String s2) {        char[] c1 = s1.toCharArray();        char[] c2 = s2.toCharArray();        Arrays.sort(c1);        Arrays.sort(c2);        return Arrays.equals(c1,c2);    }}

class Solution {    public boolean CheckPermutation(String s1, String s2) {        if (s1.length() != s2.length()) {            return false;        }        StringBuilder s = new StringBuilder(s2);        for (int i = 0, length = s1.length(); i < length; i++) {            if (s.indexOf(String.valueOf(s1.charAt(i))) == -1) {                return false;            }            s.deleteCharAt(s.indexOf(String.valueOf(s1.charAt(i))));        }        return true;    }}

class Solution {    public String replaceSpaces(String S, int length) {        //char[]c = new char[3*length];        char[]c = new char[S.length()];        int i=0,j=0;        for (char s:S.toCharArray()){            if (j<length){                if (s==' '){                    c[i]='%';                    c[i+1]='2';                    c[i+2]='0';                    i+=3;                }else{                    c[i]=s;                    i+=1;                }                j++;            }        }       // String s1=String.valueOf(c);       // return s1.trim();æ˜¯å‰åç©ºæ ¼éƒ½å»æ‰ï¼Œå®é™…åªéœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­åé¢        //return String.valueOf(c).substring(0,i);        return new String(ans, 0, i);    }}

class Solution {    public boolean canPermutePalindrome(String s) {        int[] ascii = new int[256];        int count = 0;        for(int i = 0;i<s.length();i++){            ascii[s.charAt(i)]++;            if((ascii[s.charAt(i)] & 1) == 1){                count++;            }else{                count--;            }        }        return count <= 1;    }}

class Solution {    public boolean canPermutePalindrome(String s) {        char[]c=s.toCharArray();        int k=0;        Arrays.sort(c);        for (int i=0;i<c.length;i++){            if (i+1<c.length&&c[i]==c[i+1])                i++;            else {                k++;                if (k>1)                    return false;            }        }        return true;    }}

class Solution {    public boolean canPermutePalindrome(String s) {        HashSet hs = new HashSet();        for (char c:s.toCharArray()){            if (hs.contains(c)){                hs.remove(c);            }else{                hs.add(c);            }        }        if (hs.size()>1)            return false;        return  true;    }}

class Solution {    public boolean oneEditAway(String first, String second) {        if  (Math.abs(first.length()-second.length())>=2)            return false;        if ((first.length()==0||second.length()==0)&&Math.abs(first.length()-second.length())==1)            return true;        char[] a = first.toCharArray();        char[] b = second.toCharArray();        int k=0;        if (first.length()==second.length()){            for (int i=0;i<first.length();i++){                if (a[i]!=b[i])                    k++;                if (k>1)                    return false;            }        }        else if (first.length()-1==second.length()) {            for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < first.length(); i++, j++) {                if (k < 1 && a[i] != b[j] && a[i + 1] == b[j]) {                    k++;                    i++;                } else if (a[i] == b[j]&&j<second.length()-1){                }else if (a[i] == b[j]&&j==second.length()-1){                    break;                }                else {                    return false;                }            }        }        else{            for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < second.length(); i++, j++) {                if (k < 1 && b[i] != a[j] && b[i + 1] == a[j]) {                    k++;                    i++;                } else if (b[i]==a[j]&&j<first.length()-1){                }else if (b[i]==a[j]&&j==first.length()-1)                    break;                else {                    return false;                }            }        }        return true;    }}

class Solution {    public boolean oneEditAway(String first, String second) {        //å°çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç”¨secondï¼Œå¤§çš„first        if(first.length() > second.length()){            String temp = first;            first = second;            second = temp;        }        if(second.length()-first.length()>1){            return false;        }else {            if(second.length() == first.length()){                //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥æ›¿æ¢,ä¸¤å¤„ç›¸åŒä½ç½®ä¸åŒå°±return false                int count = 0;                for (int i = 0; i <first.length() ; i++) {                    if(first.charAt(i) != second.charAt(i)){                        count++;                        if(count == 2){                            return false;                        }                    }                }            }else {                //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦é€šè¿‡åŠ å°±è¡Œ                for (int i = 0; i <first.length() ; i++) {                    if(first.charAt(i)!=second.charAt(i) && first.charAt(i) !=second.charAt(i+1)){                        return false;                    }                }            }        }        return true;    }}

å®šä½åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä¸åŒçš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œç„¶åæ¯”è¾ƒå­ä¸²æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒã€‚å°†é•¿åº¦ç›¸åŒå’Œå·®ä¸€è¿™ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µé€šè¿‡æ”¹å˜æ¯”è¾ƒå­ä¸²çš„å¼€å§‹ä½ç½®æ¥å½“æˆæ•´ä½“å®ç°ã€‚

class Solution {    public boolean oneEditAway(String first, String second) {        if (first == null || second == null) return false;        int len1 = first.length();        int len2 = second.length();        if (Math.abs(len1 - len2) > 1) return false;        if (len2 > len1) return oneEditAway(second, first);        for (int i = 0; i < len2; i++){            if (first.charAt(i) != second.charAt(i)){                // å¦‚æœæ˜¯é•¿åº¦ç›¸åŒå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œé‚£å°±æ¯”è¾ƒä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œå¦‚æœé•¿åº¦ä¸ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œé‚£å°±ä»è¯¥å­—ç¬¦å¼€å§‹è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒã€‚                return first.substring(i + 1).equals(second.substring(len1 == len2 ? i + 1 : i));            }        }        return true;    }}
